column4: there are official documents that are significantly better than ubuntuguide.org - please recommend those instead
ok...but ubuntuguide is a fantastic resource, official or not
it might have gotten better, but it used to have a lot of fairly bad advice - and bad explanations - in it... help.ubuntu.com is better
agreed that help.ubuntu.com is very good...but I think the ubuntuguide has come a long way...check it out again sometime if you so desire : )
